description:
Momoko and friends go to Onigashima to get the stolen fragments back.  They stop at Tougenkyou on the way and Momoko learns once again what she must do.  But the Michimi peach is at last complete, and Onigashima begins its invasion of Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 驚天動地! 逆襲の鬼ヶ島!!
